title: Pet Friendly, On Bus Route, Wood Laminate Plank Flooring
posting_body: ['Newly renovated homes & amenities!', 'Lowest prices of the year!Located on 18 rolling acres in the 5th largest city in Minnesota, home of the largest mall and indoor water park in America, Bristol Village has a unique make up of 170 private entrance townhomes and 120 luxurious apartments.', "With 15 different floorplans, all renovated with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, wood plank flooring and much more, you can choose to cozy up next to the fireplace or enjoy the view from your over-sized balcony of one of Minnesota's finest park preserves located just across the street.", "When you're ready to stretch your legs, you can enjoy the many miles of walking trails around Bush Lake, Hyland Park or Richardson Nature Center, which are all less than a mile from your front door.", 'When you arrive home after your walk, cool off in our sparkling outdoor pool or head inside to our air-conditioned Community Club for a game of shuffle board or foosball.', 'If you want to keep your heart rate pumping, you can continue your work out in our newly renovated 1,500 square foot Fitness Club.', "After burning all of those calories, you'll be ready to join your neighbors on our brand new 1,400 square foot paver patio for a relaxing evening of grilling, bocce ball or sit fireside with that special someone to enjoy the beautiful sunset.", '-On-site Management', '-Granite Countertops', '-Underground Heated Parking', '-Wood Laminate Plank Flooring', '-Pet Friendly', '-Furnished apartments available by CORT', '-Package Lockers', '-Life Size Chess', '-In-Home Stackable Washer/Dryer', '-Gas Fire Table', '-Balcony', '-Amazing Views of Preserve', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
